channel.title: WoW vs GW vs Lineage 2 vs Runescape * Who Will win?
channel.description:
Cast your votes!
Description: - Guild Wars: Free* MMORPG, very cool, "Free" but not cheap to buy! - Lineage 2: Free* MMORPG, not so cool as GW, poor graphics, nice variety of items! - World Of Warcraft: Not Free*, Poor graphics, very expensive, extreme variety of items and places! - Runescape: Free* or Not Free*, CRAPPY Graphics, Small variety of items, small MAP!
*No monthly payment

item.source: WoW vs GW vs Lineage 2 vs Runescape * Who Will win?

item.title: WoW vs GW vs Lineage 2 vs Runescape * Who Will win?
item.dc:creator: @vraj82192 vraj82192
item.description:
@vraj82192 wrote:

Well I play GW all the time. Except I don’t know what “All 3 factions” means… o.0

I know what you mean lol

Yeah, well GW doesn’t really get boring for me. If you get bored of PvE, go do PvP (Random Arenas first, after that gets boring, go do AB then if that gets boring go and do TA or HA) and after all that I know your really want to go back to PvE. Thats what I always do, or I just work on getting titles. GW2 is gonne be even better then WoW when it comes out. It sounds so good right now, I don’t even know how it will turn out though. This is just the planning part, there still comming out with an expansion. (first one ever) but ya I just hope it goes good. I have Factions and Nightfall. I can’t get Phrop yet, but I’m probably gonna get it soon. I’v been playing for a half of a year now.
Yeah, its 8 skills. Its not all bad with 8 skills and the 20 max level makes it all even. Meaning people with real skill in the game insted of just who has the most real $ and able to buy a power level or something else like that. It makes it so other classes don’t get to much power over the other. They try to keep everything balanced, but theyve been going over board with that. They nerfed almost all the solo farming builds and stuff. Its pretty annoying, how its harder to get greens and stuff now. Like most prices have gone up, maybe only 5-7 plat but theyve gone up.
I also heard in GW2 its gonna be like worldwide since there isn’t going the be a max level. (I think there is gonna be but its not gonna be something low like 20, I heard 99 or 100 or even more) but somewhere around there.
RuneScape has to many 10-year olds playing now. I hate it, all the people that used to play it don’t as much. Because of games like Guild Wars and WoW. I mean, your walking around and you hear kids fighting like… Level 3: “ooh your a noob” level 5: “No I’m not I have a level 30 main” … I mean seriously…
but whatever, runescapes graphics stink ass but I guess they want it that way so people with not as good computers to run all the other MMORPG games will play it. I don’t know I say RuneScape is over, the race is between Guild Wars and WoW. The race for which is better? The race for which one has more people that play? The race for which one will be the best overall?

Read full topic
item.source: WoW vs GW vs Lineage 2 vs Runescape * Who Will win?

item.title: WoW vs GW vs Lineage 2 vs Runescape * Who Will win?
item.dc:creator: @Rosk Rosk
item.description:
@Rosk wrote:

I played Runescape, Guild Wars and World of Warcraft.

I have payed membership for RS, bought all 3 factions of Guild Wars and payed lots of membership for WoW.

The first game I played was RS. I liked it and it was addicting.
It had an amazing gameplay, the interface loading was great but the graphics were crappy.
I enjoyed it.

I then got bored and decided to buy GW.
GW was an exceptional game. You could only have 8 skills (or 6, don’t remember) so you had to choose wisely and prepare you strategy.
I bought the “Factions” first. Then I bought “Prophecy” and “Nightfall”. The only thing I didn’t like is that the combat are only seen by your party, and not worldwide. I got bored in a month or two.

For christmas, i decided to buy WoW. That was a FANTASTIC game. The gameplay rocks, the graphics are good, everything was perfect.
The only thing i didn’t like is that i didn’t get addicted to it. I wasn’t motivated to play it. I used to force myself to play it because I didn’t wanted to waste the money that I bought membership with. Kinda sad…

Now I’m still playing WoW, but decided to play RS again.
I totally quit GW and wont play it. Maybe when GW2 comes out, I’ll buy it.

Note: I have a life. I only play these games on free-time.

Well here’s my 2 cents.

Read full topic

GW FTW?

Heck ya, gw is awsome man. Just wait till next year, GW2 comes out. Its gonna be even better the WoW. Over level 99+, party missions, like different battle styles.

And even hard mode is soon to come out so you get better drops and stuff. I can’t wait till it comes out man, its gonna be crazy. Tons of people are gonna get GW2, all other games are gonna go dead. Maybe not WoW, because the people that played that first like that. And don’t want to even try other games because they think its the best and there isn’t anything better then it.
